name: inss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))

stmt.origin: jaoi(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
-| wi(wss(c2, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))

-| wi(wss(c2, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))

|- wi(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
-| wi(wss(c2, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))

stmt.origin: syl5eqss(cin(c0, c2), c1, cin(c2, c0), wss(c2, c1))
stmt.pretty: syl5eqss((c0 ⋂ c2), c1, (c2 ⋂ c0), c2 ⊆ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c2, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
-| wceq(cin(c0, c2), cin(c2, c0))
-| wi(wss(c2, c1), wss(cin(c2, c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
-| wceq(cin(c0, c2), cin(c2, c0))
-| wi(wss(c2, c1), wss(cin(c2, c0), c1))

|- wi(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
-| wi(wss(c2, c1), wss(cin(c2, c0), c1))
|- wi(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
